p.#text:
If you want the door to close faster, you can
                    adjust it.
p.note:
The closing of the door must take at least 1.5 seconds from a
                        70° angle.

step.cmd: Put the carpet in place.
Install the top threshold with black 5x30 screws (4 pcs).

note:
Guide the right edge of the threshold to the right edge of the door
                        frame.

The threshold and door frame gaskets are preinstalled. Make sure that the
                        gaskets do not overlap. If they do, cut the gasket to the right
                        length.

step.cmd:
Remove the plastic. Press the doorstep down and install it with 3x12 Torx
                    screws (5 pcs) by hand.

note: Install the edge of the doorstep 2 mm on top of the carpet edge.

Make sure that the gasket does not overlap the doorstep. If it does, cut
                        the gasket to the right length.

step.cmd: Separate the hinges in two parts each.
Attach the door leaves to the door with black 5x30 screws (4 pcs each).

note: The door leaves have two small holes in the side.
Make sure that the door leaves do not overlap the gasket.

step.cmd:
Attach the frame leaves to the door frame with black 5x30 screws (4 pcs each)
                    and install a 1 mm thick adjustment plate into the lower hinge mounting
                    hole.

note:
Make sure that the hinge pin is in the frame part of the door leaves.
                        There are no holes in the door leaves.
Install the adjustment plate under the lower hinge only.

Make sure that the gasket is not squashed between the hinge and the door
                        frame.

step.cmd: Lift the door in place and guide both hinges in place.

note.#text:
Lifting requires two persons. Make sure that the lower
                        hinge falls into place.

note: Set a mat on the ground to protect the door.

step.cmd:
Push the handle with the spindle and rubber gasket in place on the outside of
                    the door.

Push the handle in place on the inside of the door. Tighten the handles with
                    M5x43 screws (2 pcs).
Place and tighten the screw of the inside handle.

note:
Make sure that the screw holes and the threads of the handles are face to
                        face.

Make sure that the set screw pierces the spindle. After this, retighten
                        the screw. Do not overtighten, or the handle does not return to
                        position.

step.cmd:
Before the adjustments, test the door and lift it 3 mm at maximum, if it
                    catches on the doorstep.

substep.cmd: Turn the bottom screw of the top hinge clockwise with a hex key.
Adjust the bottom hinge to the same level as the top hinge.

step.cmd: Make sure that the door closes correctly and smoothly.

info.note: Keep the door closed while tightening the spring.

step.cmd: Tighten the spring with the 5 mm hex key so that you feel resistance.
step.info:
The key bounds back when it encounters resistance. Test the resistance before
                    adjustment.

step.cmd: Tighten a ¼ turn.
To hold in position, hold the hex key on the hinge.

Lock the spring in place with an M5x6 screw in the hole on the right-hand
                    side.
Test the door.
step.info:
The closing of the door must take at least 1.5 seconds from a 70°
                    angle.

step.cmd: Insert the 5 mm hex key into the top of the hinge.
Hold the hex key in place and remove the M5x6 screw.
Turn the hex key a 1/4 turn and hold in place.

Insert the lock pin in the hole on the left-hand side of the hinge close to the
                    door frame.
Remove the hex key and install the M5x6 screw.
Remove the locking pin and test the door.
Repeat as needed.

note:
The lock pin holds the spring in place so it does not unwind and
                        break.

You can tighten the spring 6 x ¼ turns at the maximum after feeling
                        resistance.

step.cmd: Pull out the adjustment stick on the lower inside frame of the door.
Adjust the screw on the stick.
Push the stick back in place with a snap.
step.info:
The further the stick comes out of the door frame, the lower the door seal
                    descends. The seal descends automatically when you close the door.

step.cmd: Check with a flashlight that there is no gap under the door.
step.info:
If the light shines through from under the door, readjust the door
                    seal.
